# pm

This command offers the user the ability to view the top pre-market gainers, losers, and most active, giving the user a better understanding of the marketâ€™s movements before the market officially opens.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/scr pm signal
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| signal | screener preset | False | Pre-Market Top Gainers (pmgainers), Pre-Market Top Losers (pmlosers), Pre-Market Most Active (pmmost_active) |


---

## Examples

```
/scr pm signal:Pre-Market Top Gainers
```
